name: Black Infant Health (BIH)
short_desc: Mission is to reduce deaths of African American infants, including deaths due to Sudden Infant Death Syndrome (SIDS)
description: Offers long-term case management services and group education and support. Mission is to reduce deaths of African American infants, including deaths due to Sudden Infant Death Syndrome (SIDS). BLACK INFANT HEALTH PROGRAM (BIH) provides health education, health promotion, social support and service coordination to pregnant and parenting African-American adult women, including outreach, home visitation, health education, support groups, and referrals to enrolled families through the first year of life. Limited support and case management for fathers also available.
